member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerGeneration.Processors.ApiVersionProcessor
member.summary: An operation processor which replaces {version:apiVersion} route placeholders and filters the included versions.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of versions which should be included in the generated document (leave empty to include all versions).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the global API version parameter (ASP.NET Core only, default: true).

member.summary: Processes the specified method information.
member.returns: true if the operation should be added to the Swagger specification.

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerGeneration.SwaggerJsonSchemaGenerator.GenerateWithReferenceAndNullabilityAsync``1(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Attribute},System.Boolean,NJsonSchema.JsonSchemaResolver,System.Func{``0,NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Generetes a schema directly or referenced for the requested schema type; also adds nullability if required.
member.typeparam: The resulted schema type which may reference the actual schema.
member.param: The type of the schema to generate.
The parent attributes (e.g. property or paramter attributes).
Specifies whether the property, parameter or requested schema type is nullable.
An action to transform the resulting schema (e.g. property or parameter) before the type of reference is determined (with $ref or allOf/oneOf).
